name: tiny-json-path
description: Lightweight JSONPath-style library for getting and setting values in JavaScript objects.
author: O. Patrick Barnes

scripts.build:min: terser dist/tiny-json-path.umd.js -o dist/tiny-json-path.umd.min.js --compress --mangle && terser dist/tiny-json-path.es.js -o dist/tiny-json-path.es.min.js --compress --mangle
